title: High Unemployment Rate Among Educated Males
description: In 2023, South Africa recorded a 36.179% unemployment rate among males with basic education, one of the highest globally.

title: Significant Unemployment Among Educated Workforce
description: The unemployment rate for individuals with basic education reached 38.607% in 2023, indicating a major challenge in the labor market.

title: Young Age for Starting Lower Secondary Education
description: In 2023, South Africa had one of the highest starting ages for lower secondary school at 14 years, potentially impacting early educational development.

title: Efficient Tax Meeting Requirements
description: In 2020, South African firms required an average of just one meeting with tax officials, showcasing an efficient tax administration system.

title: High Private Sector Debt
description: In 2023, South Africa's debt from private creditors reached $750 million, indicating a significant reliance on private sector borrowing.
